The members of Arroyo Mexico Group are 8 heads of family that have installed, in their houses, Small Solar Home Systems (SSHS) which they were gathering when the picture was taken, to have a basic electricity service. Funding is asked for financing those SSHS, which will be paid back with the monthly fee that these farmers pay for maintenance services during the first year of operation.

Francisca, in the middle of the picture, is an old housewife who lives alone. She decided to get the SSHS in order to facilitate her domestic tasks, such as prepare the meal, especially by night. The SSHS provides her with four hours of electrical lighting, as well as connection to small appliances.

loans.use: to pay for having PV systems installed in their houses.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for PV systems installed in their houses.

loans.name: María Amparo

texts.es:
María de 56 años de edad, no realizó ningún grado de estudio debido a los escasos recursos económicos, se casó a los 26 años de edad y tuvo 4 hijos, su esposo falleció hace dos años y vive con dos nietos, un varón y una hembra, uno de ellos está estudiando bachillerato y la muchacha está iniciando el primer año de bachillerato.

María se dedica a la venta de pan y tamales, lo hace dos veces por semana, ella sale a vender a diferentes lugares, además plancha ropa ajena y realiza cultivo de maíz y frijoles en la temporada pues necesita generar ingresos económicos para su hogar, ya que ella es quien apoya a sus dos nietos en los estudios.

El crédito que ella solicita lo necesita para comprar harina para elaborar pan, una vaca y tres cerdos para engordarlos y luego venderlos, y así seguir con el negocio para generar los ingresos económicos que su familia necesita tanto para el estudio de sus nietos como para la alimentación diaria. 

El sueño de Maria es mejorar su vivienda, poner el piso de ladrillo, también desea poner puertas y ventanas pues las que tiene actualmente son de madera.
texts.en:
María, age 56, never went to school due to the scarce economic resources of her family. She married at 26 and had four children. Her husband died two years ago and she now lives with two grandchildren, a boy and a girl. The boy is in high school and the girl is just starting her first year of high school.

María is in the business of selling bread and tamales, which she does twice a week, going out to sell in various places. She also takes in clothing for ironing and grows corn and beans in season, all to earn additional money for her household, as she's now supporting her two grandchildren's schooling.

She needs the money from this loan to buy flour for baking bread. She will also buy a cow and three pigs to fatten them and later sell them, thus continuing her business and earning the money that her family needs to keep her grandchildren in school and fed.

María's goal is improve her home, putting in a brick floor. She also wants to put in windows and door as the ones she currently has are made from wood.

loans.use: buy flour to make bread and buy livestock to fatten and sell

loans.name: Hilario

texts.es:
El socio Hilario  se dedica al negocio de artesania, el socio vende  tejidos, chompas, mantas y telares, el socio vende diferentes tejidos, el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de venta de tejidos y telares. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar tejidos, chompas y telares.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member, Hilario, is engaged in the artisanal crafts business, and sells various fabrics, sweaters, blankets, and looms.  He works from 8:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m.  He has eight years in this business already, and it’s going very well.  His dream is to expand his business selling fabric and looms, and he is requesting the loan to purchase fabric, sweaters, and looms.  Hilario is happy to receive the loan and promises to make his payment on time.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, sweaters, and looms.

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en:
Hawa is a married woman with two kids, both of whom attend school. She lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Hawa operates a grocery-and-vegetables-selling stall. She sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. She faces a challenge of high cost of transportation to her place of operation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a motorcycle transport business in the future.

With the Kshs 50,000, she wants to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale.

loans.name: Elena Del Carmen

texts.es:
Elena, de 47 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado, no pudo seguir sus estudios debido a su situación económica, es madre soltera de dos hijos, cada uno de ellos ya hizo su propio hogar.

Elena, a pesar de su situación económica y que tenia que mantener sola a sus hijos, con mucho esfuerzo ingreso a un curso de cocina y repostería.

Ella se dedica a la elaboración de pasteles y pizzas, tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este oficio, lo cual le ha ayudado mucho para sacar adelante a sus hijos y llevar el sustento a su familia, los productos solo los elabora por encargos, los elabora en su casa y luego tiene que buscar un vehículo para llevarlos hasta el lugar donde le fueron solicitados.
 
El financiamiento sera utilizado para comprar 200 gallinas y 300 pollos de engorde, con el préstamo ella podrá colocar su granja y los ingresos que obtenga de este negocio, le ayudaran para invertir mas en la repostería y la pizzería.
 	
En el futuro ella pretende ampliar mas el negocio de las pizzas y pasteles, además, desea apoyar a sus hijos aunque ya estén casados.
texts.en:
Elena is 47 years old. She studied until the fifth grade and could not continue due the her financial situation. She is a single mother of 2 children, and each one of them now has their own home. Despite her financial situation and having to raise her children alone, with a lot of effort, Elena enrolled in a cooking and baking class.

She earns a living making cakes and pizzas. She has been working in this field for many years, which has helped her a lot to move her children ahead and provide for the daily needs of her family. She only makes products to order. She makes them in her home and then has to search for a vehicle to carry them to the place where they were ordered.

The loan will be used to buy 200 hens and 300 broiler chickens. With the loan she will be able to set up her farm, and with the income she gets from this business it will help her to invest more in the bakery and pizzeria. In the future she wants to further expand the business of the pizzas and cakes. She also wants to support her children even though they are already married.

loans.use: to buy 200 hens and 300 broiler chickens.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro, de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, por la situación económica de su familia se vio obligado a trabajar, está acompañado y su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, es padre de dos hijos, uno de ellos trabaja con él y su hija aún está estudiando.

Alejandro, se dedica a cultivar hortalizas, tiene un aproximado de 25 años realizando dicha tarea, el aprendió de su padre, pues el también cultivaba la tierra; por esa razón decidió dedicarse a esta actividad; además, es la fuente de ingresos de la cual depende el y su familia. 

Anteriormente a este oficio, se dedicaba a sembrar granos básicos y de los mismos vendía y generaba ingresos extras, la parcela donde él tiene sus hortalizas, se encuentra a 5 minutos de su casa y su hijo mayor le ayuda por las mañanas y también por las tardes.

El necesita el financiamiento para comprar semillas, insecticidas, fungicidas, para los cultivos y la preparación de la tierra. 

Alejandro, sueña con tener más parcelas con gran cantidad de verduras, para poder exportar a otros países.- También, desea ayudar a sus hijos para que continúen estudiando.
texts.en:
Alejandro, age 45, attended school through the second grade when, due to his family's economic situation, he had to leave school and start working. He is married and his wife takes care of the household. He is the father of two children: his older son works with him while his daughter is still in school,

Alejandro is in the business of growing vegetables. He's been doing this work for about 25 years, which he learned from his father who also worked the land. That knowledge is what made him get into this business; plus, it's the source of income that his family depends on.

Before he started this line of work, he planted staple grains, later selling them and earning additional money. The land where he grows his vegetables is about five minutes from his house. His older son helps him in the mornings and afternoons.

He needs this loan to buy seeds, insecticides, and fungicides for his crops and to prepare the land.

Alejandro's goal is to have more land with a greater variety of vegetables so that he can export his produce to other countries. He also wants to help his children so that they can stay in school.

loans.use: buy seed and supplies for his crops and prepare his land

loans.name: Cindy Madelym

texts.es:
Cindy es una joven de 24 años de edad, realizó sus estudios de bachillerato general los fines de semana, ella vive en casa de su mamá, es madre soltera de un niño, además en casa vive su padrastro y un hermano quienes trabajan en la agricultura, de ella solamente depende su pequeño hijo pero además aporta ingresos al hogar.

Cindy se dedica a los oficios domésticos, además apoya a su comunidad trabajando en una Adesco, esto le permite a ella trabajar para el mejoramiento de su comunidad, y al mismo tiempo para asegurar el futuro de su hijo y demás familia. 

Esta joven solicita el crédito para pagar los gastos de matrícula de la universidad, pues desea estudiar psicología, ya que a pesar de ser madre soltera ella tiene deseos inmensos por superarse.

Su sueño es graduarse de la universidad y ayudar a su madre con los gastos del hogar y darle una mejor calidad de vida a toda su familia y en especial a su hijo.
texts.en:
Cindy is a 24-year-old young woman. She completed her high school work on weekends. She lives with her mother and she is herself the single mother of one young son. Also living with them are her stepfather and a brother who work in agriculture. Only her son depends on her, but she helps to support the entire household.

Cindy works at domestic activities and she also supports her community working at an ADESCO (a local community development organization), which lets her work to improve her community while at the same time ensuring the future of her son and the rest of the family.

This young woman is requesting a loan to pay for enrollment expenses at a university, as she wants to study psychology. In spite of being a single mother, she has big dreams of improving herself.

Her dream is to graduate from university and help her mother with the household expenses, providing a better quality of living for her entire family, but particularly for her son.

loans.use: pay university enrollment expenses so that she can study psychology

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel, 32, is a father who makes a living doing mixed farming in Gachigi village located in Kerugoya area of Kenya. He keeps dairy animals and poultry for commercial milk and eggs, respectively. He also plants maize.

Besides mixed farming, Daniel is also very concerned about the health of the environment. He spends most of his time working on his tree seedling yard. He stated that the tree nursery is very demanding. He spends a lot of time working in the nursery because he lacks proper equipment.

Daniel is seeking a KES 80,000 loan to purchase farm implements. These tools will make the work on his farm move much faster and easier. Tending to his tree nursery involves a lot of digging, uprooting, planting and packaging. There are various tools in the market that are handy for a man in his line of duty. The equipment does not come cheap, however.

The increase in income from this investment will go to his family's welfare and his children's education.

Lenders, assist this Kenyan entrepreneur to realize his dream!

loans.use: To purchase farm implements.

loans.name: La Matilde Group

texts.en:
The members of La Matilde Group are 3 Mexican farmers who have decided to have, for the first time, a basic electricity service in their houses by installing Small Solar Home Systems (SSHS), which they were gathering when the picture was taken. Funding is asked for financing those SSHS, which will be paid back with the monthly fee that these people pay for maintenance services during the first year of operation.
 
Cirenia, in the middle of the picture, lives with her husband and three children in a very small and isolated house. She installed the SSHS in order to help her children to do their homework. The SSHS includes three lamps that are providing them with four hours of electrical lighting.

loans.use: to pay for PV systems installed in their houses.

loans.name: Ermitania

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; el Banco Comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, Provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia  continua con su negocio de  picantería, la socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, la socia continua elaborando  diferentes platos típicos como trucha al horno con ensalada y papa doradas, rocoto relleno y otros, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
 La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como carnes, aceite, arroz entre otros.
texts.en: The member belongs to the “Cristo Asención de Rumichaca” communal bank, located in the Urubamba district and province, Cusco department. The member continues with her “picantería” [restaurant specializing in spicy foods] business, making typical dishes such as baked trout with salad and fried potatoes, and stuffed peppers.   She wishes to continue working in this way and continue supporting her family.  She is requesting the loan to purchase meat, oil, rice, and other supplies.  She is grateful for the loan, and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase meat, oil, rice, and other supplies.

loans.name: Kholmo

texts.en:
Kholmo is a friendly and honest woman. She lives in Hamadoni district. For 18 years she has worked at school as a teacher. She is one of the best teachers of the district. Her husband is a teacher, too. She has four sons. They are very well-mannered and kind boys.

Kholmo learned sewing with help from her friend. She wants to buy a sewing machine and start her new activity. Currently in Tajikistan, this business is very profitable. But unfortunately, her salary is not enough to purchase a sewing machine. For this reason, she applied for a loan. Kholmo likes this work and believes that in this activity, she will achieves success. She will be able to start her business and increase her income.

Your support is very important to her.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is a married woman staying together with her husband and children. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past 20 years, she has operated a firewood-selling business. She sells from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding her business to a wholesale supplier of firewood in the village.

With the Kshs 50,000, she wants to purchase bundles of firewood for resale. She decided to join to Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of firewood for resale

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a 43-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. She lives with her family in the town of San Miguel, Bohol. She has been engaged in a rice farming business with her husband for several years now. This is their main source of income.

Jocelyn would like to avail a loan to buy more seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. A loan will help her improve her rice farming business, thus augmenting her yield and harvest. In the future, Jocelyn dreams of expanding her farm and saving money for the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to buy more seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides for the farm

loans.name: Jacinta's Group

texts.en:
Jacinta is 54 years old and has eight children. She has been a farmer for more than 20 years and is always said to be a very hardworking individual. Even though Jacinta is the only one featured in the above picture, she is actually representing her group, formed by 14 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya.

Jacinta started working alongside One Acre Fund a few years ago, in 2010, and decided to do so because she wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since then, she has seen her life improve, especially in the sense that she has been able to consistently feed her family ever since. This year she decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers.

Jacinta’s Group will receive farming inputs to plant a total of 7.25 acres of land. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light, so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of five solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost-efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season.

loans.name: Nifa's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Nifa, who, as a group leader, is representing her group formed by nine farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. She is a married mother to three children and is known by her community as a very hardworking individual.

Initially, Nifa joined One Acre Fund in 2011 because she wanted to earn enough to feed her family. Since she joined the program she says that her life has improved, especially because she has been able to consistently feed her family. With the profits from the coming harvesting season, Nifa plans to buy a cow.

Among the nine farmers in Nifa's Group, a total of 5.5 acres of land will be planted using the maize seeds and fertilizer received with the loan. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of four solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize

loans.name: Narine

texts.en:
Narine and her big family live in Lusashogh village, Ararat region. Her family members are six: her husband, parents-in-law, brother-in-law and two sons (5 and 8 years old).

Narine and her family are running a farm. It includes a big livestock of lambs, cows, calves, pigs and piglets, and hens. They sell meat and milk in local markets.

To be able to feed the livestock, Narine asks lenders to help her. The requested loan will help Narine and her family members to purchase grass as a forage for feeding the livestock (930 packages).

As this is Narine's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products in the past because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for grass as a forage for feeding the livestock (930 packages)

loans.name: Rahila

texts.en:
Rahila is a 53-year-old unhappy widow with two children. Rahila's life is very hard. She is raising her two kids by herself. 

Rahila has been working in a local bazar for 33 years. Rahila sells eggs and vegetables in the bazar. In this work she needs to be strong and attentive because she works in a noisy place. Her monthly income is 180 manat.

Her profit is less, so she can only buy food for her children. She wants to make a fence and build a little place to raise cows on her land so that she can get rid of this poor life. For this reason, Rahila has applied for a loan of 1,200 AZN from Aqroinvest Credit Union.

Rahila hopes lenders help her.

loans.use: to make a fence and build a little place to raise cows

loans.name: Reginalda

texts.en:
Reginalda is a 41-year-old married woman and a mother of six children. She lives in San Miguel, Bohol. Reginalda makes a living through her rice-farming business. She helps her husband in their farming business.

Reginalda is asking to take a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides and to pay for labor. This loan will enable her to improve the productivity of her farm, thus augmenting her yield and income. In the future, Reginalda wants to expand their farm in order to generate more revenue.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a water purification machine for his home

loans.name: Berta Noemi

texts.es:
Berta, de 43  años de edad, no tubo la oportunidad de estudiar, es casada y madre de 4 hijos, de los cuales una ya esta casada y los otros 3 viven con ella y su esposo.

Berta, se dedica a los oficios del hogar y a cuidar de sus hijos, mientras su esposo sale a trabajar fuera del municipio, también sus hijos en sus tiempos libres, realizan trabajos pequeños que generan ingresos para los gastos del hogar.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar lámina, clavos y otros materiales para reparar el techo de su vivienda, ya que el invierno lo daño.
 
El sueño de Berta, es poder reparar su vivienda para poder vivir en mejores condiciones ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Berta is 43 years old, and she did not have the opportunity to study. She is married, and the mother of 4 children. Of her children, one is already married and the other 3 live with her and her husband.

Berta is dedicated to the household chores and looking after her children, while her husband goes to work outside of the city. Also, in her children's free time they perform small jobs that earn income for the home expenses.

She is requesting the loan to buy sheeting, nails and other materials to repair the roof of her home since it was damaged in the winter. Berta's dream is to repair her home to be able to live in better conditions for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy sheeting, nails and other materials to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Azniv

texts.en:
Azniv lives in Sevan city of Gegharkunik region. Many years she worked at the poultry factory, but now with her beloved husband she is engaged in farming. As she says, her farm is very nice and cute. Here, she takes care of two cows, two calves, three pigs and two sheep. As she says, this small assortment of farm animals on her farm brings so much work that they are busy with its care all day long. They sell milk and a little meat from their farm.

Azniv mentions that if she had better health (from a very young age she has had health problems), she would surely make her farm larger and richer with cattle, and she would also manage to sell more farm products. Azniv feels weak and unhealthy recently, and she is very upset that she is now less active than before.

This loan, in an amount of 400,000 Armenian drams, will serve for her to pay for proper medical examination, and, if needed, she will also have some course of treatment with this loan amount.

loans.use: to pay for a proper medical examination, and, if needed, some course of treatment.

loans.name: Ana Yanci

texts.es:
Ana, de 24 años de edad, es una persona trabajadora, estudio bachillerato comercial, está casada y no tiene ningún hijo, su esposo realiza varios trabajos, de donde tiene sus ingresos para la familia y en su casa vive su mamá. 

Ana, se dedica a la venta de ropa para dama, caballeros y niños; tiene cuatro años de que inició con el negocio propio, esto lo aprendió de su madre, quien fue la que enseño como administrar el negocio.- Ahora, por la edad  de su  madre, Ana es la que está al pendiente del negocio y es la responsable de llevar los alimentos a casa.- Para llegar al negocio debe de viajar en bus 20 minutos, trabaja de lunes a sábado, porque el día domingo se lo dedica a su madre y a los oficios de la casa.

El dinero del préstamo lo utilizara para comprar dos fardos de pantalones y blusas, para surtir el negocio y así incrementar un poco más sus ingresos, con esto también cubrirá la demanda que tiene en su negocio, por  el lugar de ubicación mucha gente, visita el negocio de Ana.

Ana, desea darle mejores condiciones de vida a su madre, también, quiere mejorar su negocio y tener más ingresos.- Pero el mayor deseo de Ana es, poder tener un hijo que llegue a alegrar su vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 24 years old. She is a hard-working person, and she studied through high school, concentrating on business. She is married, and she does not have any children. Her husband works a variety of jobs that provide him with an income to support the family. Her mother lives with them.

Ana makes a living selling clothing for women, men, and children. She started this business on her own four years ago. She learned this work from her mother, who taught her how to manage the business. Now, as a result of her mother's age, Ana is the one who takes care of the business, and she is responsible for taking food home. In order to get to her business, she travels 20 minutes by bus. She works Monday through Saturday, and she spends Sunday with her mother and attending to household chores.

She is requesting a loan to buy two bundles of pants and shirts in order to stock her business and, in this way, increase her income a bit. With this loan, she will also cover her business's high demand. As a result of its location, many people visit Ana's business. Ana wishes to give her mother a better quality of life. She also wants to improve her business and increase her earnings. Ana's greatest wish is to have a child who brightens up her life.

loans.use: to buy two bundles of pants and shirts.

loans.name: Karina Elizabeth

texts.es:
Karina, de 22 años de edad, estudió hasta séptimo grado, no estudio más tiempo debido a los problemas económicos de su familia, es madre soltera de un hijo de 4 años de edad, vive en casa de su abuela. 

Karina, trabaja desde hace 1 año de mesera en un restaurante, entro a trabajar ahí gracias  a que ahí trabajaba una amiga y la recomendó, decidió trabajar debido a que es madre soltera y necesita tener ingresos económicos para poder satisfacer las necesidades básicas de su hijo.- Antes de entrar a trabajar en este lugar, ella se dedicaba a los oficios domésticos en su casa y a cuidar a su hijo, el horario que tiene actualmente es rotativo y para poder llegar a su trabajo tiene que caminar hora y media en autobús.

El financiamiento del préstamo lo utilizara para comprar 15 bolsas de cemento, 4 quintales hierro, 800 ladrillos, tejas y poder pagar la mano de obra para construir un cuarto en su casa, esto le beneficiara debido a que podrá tener más espacio en su casa.

Karina, desea en un futuro poder tener un mejor empleo, en el cual pueda obtener un mejor sueldo, también desea ayudar a su hijo a estudiar y que pueda lograr sacar una carrera universitaria, para que se desarrolle mejor en su vida social.
texts.en:
Karina is 22 years old, and has a seventh grade education.  She didn’t study any further due to her family’s financial difficulties.  She is a single mother of a four year old boy, and lives with her grandmother. 

Karina has been working as a waitress in a restaurant for one year. She started working there thanks to a friend that worked there and recommended her.  She decided to work because she was a single mother and needed to have income to support her son’s basic needs.  Before starting to work in this place, she was engaged in household chores at home and caring for her son.  Currently, she works rotating shifts, and she has to travel an hour and a half by bus to get to work.

She will use the loan funds to purchase fifteen bags of cement, four quintals of iron, eight hundred bricks, and tiles, and to pay labor costs to build a room in her home.  This will be beneficial because she will have more space in her home.

In the future, Karina wishes to have a better job in which she can obtain a better salary.  She also wishes to help her son with his education so that he can get a college degree, and be better developed in his social life.

loans.use: to purchase fifteen bags of cement, four quintals of iron, eight hundred bricks, and tiles, and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase women's clothes and incense to resell.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
"Farming is said to be the best employment, because nobody can sack you. You can start from any level and there are so many forms of farming you can engage in," says Lucy. 

Lucy is a mother of ten and has been practicing mixed farming in Juja, a remote village in the Thika area of Kenya. For the past seven years she has been selling milk, eggs, maize and she has some personal business to supplement the meagre income she earns. 

If there is one thing Lucy is good at, it is raising farm animals! “Kairu”, her dairy cow, is very well taken care of. She gets the best feed and medical care Lucy can provide. However, her biggest challenge is raising capital. Lucy has a sound investment plan that will push her to the next level. 

Lucy is seeking a loan through Kiva to purchase a water tank. Constant availability of water at her homestead will make work very easy for her. Her farm animals and poultry will have a constant flow of drinking water, her family will have water for domestic use at the doorstep, and the crops on the farm will grow green and healthy through irrigation. Lucy wants to harvest rain water that always goes to waste and store it in the water tank for future use. 

With your contribution, Lucy will seek to increase the number of animals on her farm because her animals will no longer have the challenge of no drinking water. This loan will improve her living conditions, and she will secure the future of her children and grandchildren. Lucy patiently awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a water tank

loans.name: Felipe De Jesus

texts.es:
Felipe, de 56 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, se acompaño y es padre de 6 hijos, 4 de ellos ya están casados, solo 2 viven con el en su casa.

Felipe, se dedica al cuido de cultivo de café en una cooperativa ubicada en su comunidad, en su tiempo libre cultiva granos básicos para el consumo de su familia, mientras su esposa atiende los oficios del hogar.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar insumos agrícolas, para la preparación de la parcela en la cual siembra sus cultivos.

El sueño de Felipe es, tener una buena cosecha en este año, para brindar a su familia una buena alimentación.
texts.en:
Felipe, 56, did not have an opportunity to get an education.  He is married and is the father of 6 children, 4 of whom are already married.  Only 2 of his children still live with him in his home.

Felipe works cultivating coffee for a cooperative located in his community.  In his spare time he cultivates staple grains for his family's consumption while his wife tends to the household chores.

Felipe needs this loan to buy agricultural supplies to prepare the land where he plans his crops.

Felipe's dream is to have a good harvest this year so that he can feed his family well.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies

loans.name: Rufino

texts.es:
Rufino es un hombre que ama la agricultura, y le gusta convivir con la naturaleza, él tiene 33 años, y vive junto a su familia en Sololá. Pues para la generación de sus ingresos económicos trabaja como agricultor a él le encanta sembrar la papa, él desde pequeña aprendió el oficio, pues previo al primer prestamo en ADICLA el sembraba poco porque no contaba con capital, pero este prestamo le vino a fortalecer y sembró un poco más y se dio cuenta que genero más ingresos y ganancias. 
Rufino ahora con estos resultados solicita nuevamente un prestamo de mil quinientos quetzales, que le servirá nuevamente como capital de trabajo y con ese dinero el comprará semillas y fertilizantes para su nuevo cultivo,  la meta de Rufino incrementar cada vez la siembra para generar más ingresos y ganancias, para Rufino los prestamos son de gran apoyo a las  personas siempre y cuando uno le da buen uso. Rufino tiene expectativas que más adelante el pueda formar su propio capital con sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Rufino is a man who loves farming and likes to live in harmony with nature.  He is 33 years old and lives together with his family in Sololá.  He works as a farmer in order to earn his income.  He loves to sow potatoes.  From a young age he learned this line of work.  Before his first loan from ADICLA he sowed only a little because he didn’t have enough capital, but this loan came along to bolster him up.  He planted a little more and realized that this generated more income and earnings.

Now with those results Rufino is asking again for a loan of 1,500 quetzals, which will again serve him as working capital.  With this money he will buy seeds and fertilizers for his new crop.  Rufino’s goal is to increase his planting each time in order to generate more income and earnings.  In Rufino’s opinion the loans are a great help to people as long as they put them to good use.  Rufino has great hopes that in the future he will be able to get his own capital from his earnings.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Eli Onan

texts.es:
Eli de 29 años de edad, está casado desde hace cuatro años, junto con su esposa ha procreado dos hijos, uno de tres años de edad y la niña de tres meses de edad, su esposa trabaja cuidando una casa en la ciudad de lunes a viernes, y los días sábados y domingos estudia a distancia en el instituto de la ciudad. Eli creció con sus padres, es el mayor de sus cincos hermanos quienes siempre han trabajado en la agricultura y las hortalizas y solo estudió hasta tercer grado del nivel básico en la escuela de la comunidad. 

Eli trabaja desde que tenía 10 años de edad, su padre le enseñó a sembrar maíz, frijoles y hortalizas, cuando se casó decidió continuar estas actividades agrícolas pues en el lugar donde él vive es muy productivo. Él siembra media hectárea de hortalizas de la cual está pendiente todos los días desde las seis de la mañana hasta las cuatro de la tarde, su esposa le ayuda al cuido de las pequeñas parcelas de hortalizas y cuida a los niños.
Eli compra los insumos en la ciudad, para lo cual tiene que caminar durante una hora para luego tomar el bus que lo lleva a la ciudad donde compra los insumos.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar insumos para sembrar una parcela de pepinos, ejotes y el resto para comprar madera y teja, pues necesita hacer unos arreglos en la casa donde reside.

Su sueño es construir su propia casa en la comunidad, además está en disposición de apoyar a su esposa para que siga estudiando y salir adelante para darle lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
29 year-old Eli has been married for four years, and has had two children with his wife: one is a three year-old boy, and the other is a three month-old girl. His wife works taking care of a house in the city from Monday to Friday, and on Saturdays and Sundays she studies from home with the city training centre. Eli grew up with his parents and is the eldest of his five siblings, who have always worked in farming and vegetables; he only studied until the third grade in elementary school in the community's school.

Eli has been working since he was 10; his father taught him to plant corn, beans and vegetables. When he got married he decided to continue farming, since the area he lives in is very fruitful. He plants half a hectare of vegetables, which he checks up on every day from six in the morning until four in the afternoon. His wife helps him take care of the small plots of vegetables and takes care of the children. Eli buys supplies in the city, which takes him an hour to walk, then he travels by bus which takes him to the city where he buys the supplies.

He needs the loan to buy supplies to plant a plot of cucumbers and green beans, and will use the rest to buy wood and tiles because he needs to do some repairs on the house he lives in.

His dream is to build his own home in the community, and moreover he would be in a position to support his wife so that she might continue to study and get ahead to give their children the best.

loans.use: to buy supplies to plant a plot of cucumbers, green beans, and the rest helps to buy wood and tiles because he needs to do some repairs parts of the house he lives in.

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; el Banco Comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, Provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
El socio continua ejerciendo su profesión de músico  y a la vez también  de artesano, el socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota, él socio lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a la música el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso, él socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para comprar un instrumento musical.
texts.en:
This bank member belongs to the communal bank "Cristo Asencion de Rumichaca," which is located in the district of Urubamba, in the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

He continues practicing his profession of musician and is also an artisan. He is grateful for the loan, and he promises to make the payments on his account. 

He has been working in music for a long time, and it is going well for him thanks to the effort that he puts into it every day. He is a responsible and persevering person. He wants to be able to continue working so that in this way he can continue supporting his family.

He is applying for the loan to buy a musical instrument.

loans.use: to buy a musical instrument

loans.name: Elma

texts.en:
Elma, 52, is a married woman residing in the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her area. Elma has been in the business for more than 10 years now. 

Elma is requesting to take a loan to buy more merchandise to sell such as canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, snack foods, condiments, and others. This loan will enable her to improve her inventory, thus allowing her to attract more buyers to her store. 

In the future, Elma hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell such as canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, snack foods, condiments and others

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for labor to roof his house

loans.name: Sumaira

texts.en:
Sumaira is a 36-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a school in her community for the last 18 years. 

A highly educated woman herself, with a Master's degree, Sumaira wants to provide educational opportunities for other children. She has been working hard to make her school a success, and today there are over 200 students in the school. 

She requires a loan of 75,000 PKR to setup a computer lab for her students to be able to gain the skills they need to be successful and productive members of society.

loans.use: to setup a computer lab for her students to be able to gain the skills they need to be successful and productive members of society

loans.name: Shamsiyamo

texts.en:
Shamsiyamo is a good-natured and sociable woman who lives in Farkhor district. All her neighbors respect her, because she always helps them in their difficult times. She is 59 years old and has 6 children. Her older son immigrated to Russia. He is working there and helps provide for his family. Her husband is a worker too. 

Shamsiyamo was in the livestock business and has good experience. Currently she wants to start this activity again. She is planning to buy several head of cattle to start her business. She has a barn and other conditions for the care of the animals.  Her husband and son will help her. But unfortunately she does not have enough money. So she decided to get a loan. This loan will helps her to increase her income. Your support is very important for her.

loans.use: to purchase livestork

loans.name: Amjad

texts.en:
Amjad is a 35-years-old married man from Rafah city. He is a father to two sons and two daughters. Amjad is an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This is the only source of income for the family. 

Amjad would like to improve the family's living conditions.  Amjad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a water purification machine for his home. By taking this loan, Amjad will be able to provide clean water for his kids.

Amjad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a water purification machine for his home

loans.name: Jhaquilou

texts.en:
Jhaquilou is a married woman from Bien Unido, Bohol.  She runs a small variety store business selling various goods and items to the people in her area. Her husband works as a fisherman.  

Jhaquilou is asking for a loan to pay for the repairs of her husband's fishing boat and to buy more inventory like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages for her store.

This loan will help them in improve their fishing business as well as her sari-sari store. Jhaquilou’s future plans include the expansion of her business and to send her two children to school.

loans.use: to buy more inventory like canned goods, noodles, soda, and beverages to sell

loans.name: Teodora

texts.en:
Teodora is a 63-year-old married woman from Trinidad, Bohol. She is married and has seven grown up children. 

Teodora runs a small business selling dry goods like children’s toys, clothes and slippers. She is also engaged in a rice farming business with her husband. These are the sources of her income. 

Teodora is asking for a loan to buy more inventory to sell like clothes, slippers and sandals, fashion accessories, and fertilizer for the farm.  This loan will enable her to improve her store thus allowing her to sell more to her customers. In addition, Teodora will be able to improve her farming business. 

In the future, Teodora hopes of making her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more inventory to sell like clothes, slippers and sandals, fashion accessories, and fertilizer for the farm

loans.name: Mirian Yaneth

texts.es:
Mirian es una persona de  31 años de edad, estudió hasta el noveno grado, es madre de dos niños quienes estudian nivel básico en el centro escolar de la comunidad.
Ella procede de una familia de nueve hermanos, con quienes han trabajado la agricultura y en los oficios del hogar, su esposo trabaja todos los días de la semana en la ciudad  en construcción de viviendas.

Mirian trabaja desde hace cinco años en la venta de productos de lencerías, lociones, cremas y otros productos, decidió emprender esta actividad debido a la demanda que tiene en la comunidad y en otros sectores donde ella comercializa los productos.
Ella compra los productos en  la ciudad que está a una hora y media viajando en transporte urbano.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar madera para mejorar el techo de la vivienda, además comprará mas productos de lencería como lociones y ropa, de esta manera tendrá mas variedad de productos para sus clientes.

Mirian sueña con darle la educación necesaria a sus hijos para que logren ser profesionales y construir de manera progresiva su vivienda junto con su esposo.
texts.en:
Mirian is a person of 31 years of age. She went to school through ninth grade. She is the mother of two children who attend the school center in the community at the basic level.

She comes from a family of nine siblings, with whom she has worked in agriculture and in household tasks. Her husband works every day of the week in the city, building houses.

Mirian has worked for five years selling lingerie products, lotions, creams, and other products. She decided to undertake this business due to the demand that she has in the community and in other sectors where she sells her products.

She buys the products in the city that is an hour and a half away, traveling by urban transportation.

She needs the loan to buy wood to improve the roof of her house. In addition, she will buy more lingerie products, such as lotions and clothing. In this way she will have more variety of products for her customers.

Maria dreams of giving the necessary education to her children so that they can become professionals and gradually constructing her home, along with her husband.

loans.use: to buy wood to improve the roof of her house, and also to buy more lingerie products such as lotions and clothing.

loans.name: Musarat

texts.en:
Musarat is a 43-year-old married woman.  Musarat is a motivated woman who does not shy away from hard work. 

She has been successfully running a school in her community for the last six years. Today, there are more than 150 students in the school. She wants to expand her business to provide opportunities for more children in the community to get a good education. 

She has requested a loan of 100,000 PKR to buy chairs and a computer for the students in her school.

loans.use: to buy chairs and a computer for the students in her school

loans.name: Ela Saraí

texts.es:
Ela de 24 años de edad, es una joven que estudió hasta 7° grado, vive con sus hermanos y sus padres, su padre se dedica a la agricultura y su madre se dedica a los oficios domésticos, a cuidar del hogar y de sus demás hermanos. 

Actualmente, Ela trabaja en la elaboración de hamacas, oficio que lo aprendió desde hace 15 años, se lo enseñó su madre pues ella se dedicaba a dicho oficio, Ela elabora hamacas de seda y de poliseda para lo cual no tiene horario de trabajo específico pues lo realiza en su casa y lo hace casi todo el día, anteriormente Ela trabajaba cuidando a un bebé.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar 150 libras de hilo de seda para hamacas y así incrementar el negocio familiar, además invertirá en su vivienda.

Su sueño es seguir estudiando pues quiere superarse y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Ela is 24 years old. She is a young woman who studied up until the 7th grade. She lives with her siblings and her parents. Her father makes a living farming and her mother dedicates herself to domestic work, taking care of the home and the other children.

Currently, Ela makes hammocks, work she learned 15 years ago. Her mother taught her how to do it, and then she dedicated her self to this work. Ela makes hammocks out of silk and polyester. She has no specific work hours, but she does her work in her house, and she does it almost all day long. Before this, Ela worked taking care of a baby.

She needs the loan to buy 150 pounds of silk thread for hammocks, and in that way, grow the family business, and in addition she will invest in her home.

Her dream is to continue studying because she wants to better herself and help her family.

loans.use: To buy 150 pounds of silk thread for hammocks and in that way, grow her family business, and in addition, invest it in her home

loans.name: Mijgona

texts.en:
Mijgona is a young mother of three children. They are 6, 3 , and 1 years old. She is a good wife, caring mother, and a great hostess. Mijgona lives in Farkhor district. Her husband is a driver. He has a truck, which he uses for work, but unfortunately the profit is very low, so Mijgona wants to create her own business to increase the family economcal situation. It is the main reason why she is getting a loan. 

She wants to purchase and sell livestock. She has all the necessary requirements for the livestock.  Mijgona is asking you to give her the opportunity to implement their plans. She believes in Kiva lenders and hopes for your support.

loans.use: to purchase animals for retail

loans.name: Lucy Marina

texts.es:
Lucy, de 30 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, por la situación económica de su madre, tuvo que dejar sus estudios, es madre soltera de tres hijos, dos están estudiando y la más pequeña todavía no asiste a la escuela, en su casa vive también su madre.

Lucy, se dedica a vender alimentos típicos de nuestro país como lo es enchiladas, yuca frita, chilate con miel, hojuelas y frutas de temporada, lo hace por la tarde en toda su comunidad, se dedica a eso porque ella necesita una fuente de ingresos para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos.- Antes de dedicarse a este negocio, ella elaboraba tortillas y su madre era quien le colabora en la elaboración de este producto.

Con el financiamiento Lucy, comprará ladrillos, hierro, cemento, laminas y pagara la mano de obra, para construir un baño, ya que toda la familia lo necesita.

Lucy, en un futuro quiere obtener un crédito más grande, para ampliar más su casita y que su familia tenga mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Lucy, who is 30 years old, studied up until the sixth grade. Due to the economic situation of her mother, she had to leave her studies. She is a single mother of three children, two of whom are studying, and the smallest one does not go to school yet. Her mother lives in her house also.

Lucy makes a living selling her country's typical food like enchiladas, fried yucca, chilate with honey, fritters, and seasonal fruits. She sells during the afternoon all over her community. She dedicates herself to this because she needs a source of income to be able to help her children to get ahead. Before she worked in this business, she made tortillas, and her mother was the one who worked with her to make this product.

With the financing, Lucy will buy bricks, iron, cement, sheet metal, and will pay for labor to build a bathroom, now that the whole family needs it.

In the future, Lucy wants to obtain a bigger loan to expand her house more and so that her family will have better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy bricks, iron, cement, sheet metal, and to pay for labor in order to build a bathroom.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy various products

loans.name: Salma

texts.en:
Salma is a 30-year-old married woman. She has been running a beauty parlor business ten years. The man shown in the photo is her father. 

Salma offers many services to her customers such as makeup, hair styling, and facials etc. Over time she has attained a regular list of customers and makes enough to contribute to the family income. Now she needs to provide more customers with regular services.  Therefore, she availed a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR to buy hair care products, skin care products, and creams for bleaching and whitening in large quantities. 

She is confident that her business will move toward a positive direction as a result of the loan investment.

loans.use: to buy hair care products, skin care products, and creams for bleaching and whitening in large quantities

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en:
Sajida, age 30, is a married woman and has 3 children. The man shown in the photo is her brother. He started a van driving business 5 years ago. He owns a Suzuki van and needs some financial help to repair and maintain the van. 

Sajida has availed a loan from Murabaha of 30,000 PKR for her brother to purchase new tires and spare parts. She is hopeful that her brother’s business will prosper and their living standards will improve.

loans.use: to purchase new tires and spare parts

loans.name: Sumaira

texts.en:
Sumaira is 22 years old, married, and has 2 children. She has been successfully running a cosmetics sale business with her husband (also shown in the photo). They earn a good amount of income to run their household activities.   

She has availed a Murabaha loan for 35,000 PKR to purchase more beauty products in bulk including lotions, lightening creams, and face washes to meet the increasing demand of her customers. The loan will help her generate more profits and increase her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase more beauty products in bulk including lotions, lightening creams, and face washes to meet the increasing demand of her customers

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy clothing

loans.name: Pedro Arnoldo

texts.es:
Pedro de 45 años de edad estudió hasta 2° año de bachillerato, actualmente está casado y ha procreado 4 hijos que están estudiando y son los únicos que dependen de él.

Pedro es empleado desde hace 10 años, también se dedica a la albañilería en sus días libres. 

El crédito lo invertirá para comprar hierro y fabricar un portón también para hacer una cocina artesanal.

Él sueña con mejorar su casa ya que vivirán con su familia en mejores condiciones, también sueña con que sus hijos sean profesionales y mejorar poco a poco su vivienda.
texts.en: Pedro is 45 years old and studied until his second year of high school. He is married and has four children that depend on him. Pedro has been an employee for the past 10 years and also works in construction on his days off. He will use this loan to invest in iron to make a gate and also to construct a traditional kitchen. He dreams of improving his home so that his family can have better living conditions and also dreams that his children will be able to become professionals and improve their home.

loans.use: to buy iron and construct a gate and traditional kitchen.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his sewing work.

loans.name: José Edgardo

texts.es:
José es un joven que vive en compañía de sus padres a sus 22 años de edad ha logrado terminar sus estudios de secundaria con el apoyo de sus padres, pero actualmente considera que sus estudios universitarios deben ser costeados por si mismo, mediante su empleo.
Esta por terminar sus estudios de  administración industrial y negocios el cual lo hace sentir honrado y orgulloso de sus propios méritos académicos.
Considera ser un joven responsable, honesto trata de cumplir con sus deberes a tiempo para así poder evitar dar excusas.Su motivación inicial y a largo plazo es poder seguir estudiando ya que es la base inicial de su éxito personal.
Afirma que todos los jóvenes pueden contribuir al país al igual que el mediante la educación, ya que una persona sin educación puede vivir un mundo lleno de muchas dificultades generando así pobreza y condiciones de vida muy  difíciles.
Su sueño siempre fue estudiar medicina pero algunos percances le impidieron lograr ese sueño, considera aun no haberse dado por vencido ya que hay mucho tiempo para poder lograr lo que se anhela en esta vida.
Su sueño y meta a futuro es poder invertir su tiempo, conocimientos y dedicación en una empresa que le permita ser un joven totalmente competitivo.
texts.en:
Jose, 22, lives with his parents. He graduated from high school with their support, but now that he is in university he feels that he should cover the costs through his job. He is close to finishing his studies in Industrial Management and Business, and he feels proud of his academic achievements. He is a responsible young man, honest, and tries to complete all his duties on time without excuses.

His long term motivation is to continue studying since this will be the basis for his personal success. He says that all young people can contribute to their country as he does, through education, because an uneducated person can live in a world with many difficulties and challenges as a result of poverty. His dream was always to study medicine, but some mishaps kept him from achieving that. He did not give up, and still feels he has time to achieve his dreams in life.

His dream and goal for the future is to invest his time, knowledge and dedication in a business that will allow him to be competitive.

loans.use: to finish his university studies in Industrial Management and Business.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en:
Zainab is a divorced woman and is blessed with three children who attend school.  She lives in a rental home that has electricity but no piped water and her greatest monthly expense are school fees.  She mentioned disease outbreak causing loses as a challenge in her business.  

Zainab has operated a poultry selling business for over 4 years and dreams of becoming a wholesaler of poultry in the future.  With the 50,000 KES loan, she wants to purchase chickens and poultry feed.  She joined Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase chickens and poultry feed.

loans.name: Lourdes Guadalupe

texts.es:
Lourdes, es una persona que tiene la responsabilidad de sacar a delante a su hijo de 6 años de edad, ella es madre soltera, vive con sus padres y su hijo, desde hace algunos años aprendió a comercializar útiles escolares, floreros, peluches, entre otros accesorios, su propósito ha sido generar ingresos para ser independiente y sacar a su hijo adelante, atiende su negocio de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m.
Con el capital surtirá su negocio comprando mochilas, cuadernos, calzado, papelería, porta fotos, etc., de esta manera tendrá un negocio competitivo, busca mantener clientes satisfechos, incrementar sus ventas e ingresos, así respaldara el pago de su deuda.
Sus proyectos son tener un negocio más amplio, ofrecer empleo a otras personas, estabilizar sus ingresos y a seguir aportando para que su familia tenga menos necesidades.
texts.en: Lourdes is a person with the responsibility to forge ahead her 6 year old son. She is a single mom, and lives with her parents and son. Several years ago, she learned to sell school supplies, flowerpots, stuffed toys, among other accessories. Her goal is to generate earnings to become independent and help her child thrive. She tends to her business from 7:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. With this loan, she will buy backpacks, notebooks, footwear, paper products, picture frames, etc. This way she will have a competitive business, keep her customers satisfied, and she will increase her sales and earnings, to be able to payoff her debt. Her goals are to expand her business, offer employment to other people, stabilize her income, and to continue contributing so that her family has fewer needs.

loans.use: To buy backpacks, notebooks, footwear, paper products, picture frames, etc. to have a competitive business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use:
To invest in meat, vegetables, rice, grains, drinks, oil, etc. 
Also to make repairs to the tables and chairs of the business.

loans.name: Delmy Alejandrina

texts.es:
Delmy de 37 años de edad es soltera, con ella viven dos hijos a quienes ha criado sola y los cuales dependen de ella. 

Ella se dedica a la crianza y engorde de cerdos, tiene 6 años de realizar este negocio, el cual aprendió por medio de su hermano, anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de frutas y en su negocio se involucran sus hijos. 

Este préstamo lo necesita muchísimo para comprar cerdos para engordarlos y venderlos en un futuro. 

Sus sueños son mejorar su casa ya que se encuentra en malas condiciones,  también que sus hijos estudien para que se desempeñen en un buen empleo.
texts.en:
Delmy is 37 years old and single, and lives with two children that she has raised on her own and who depend on her.

She works in the raising and fattening of pigs, and has spent 6 years in this business that she learned from her brother. Previously she worked selling fruit, and her children participate in her business.

She really needs this loan to purchase pigs to fatten and sell them in the future.

Her dreams are to improve her house, which is in bad shape, and also for her kids to get an education so that they can obtain good employment.

loans.use: To purchase pigs to fatten and sell them in the future.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit lives in Vaghatin village, Sisian region. She has been involved in agriculture for more than 11 years. 
Her farm includes livestock of 16 sheep and arable land where she cultivates potato and grass for feeding livestock. 
Anahit lives with her husband and 24-years-old son who help her with farming activities. 
To expand her livestock by 5 more sheep, Anahit asks this loan. 
She has taken a loan from local financial institutions before, but because of very difficult financial conditions, wasn't able to pay it back on time. Now, by ensuring that her farming business is successful and she is able to provide monthly payments for this loan, Anahit has been approved for this loan. She has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The second chance loan program provides loans to people who have a bad credit history and have no access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for 5 sheep
